item.description:
All, we can meet at the Third Life Studio in Union Square to share Reiki & other energywork techniques with each other on either Friday, July 29 or Tuesday, August 2 (both in the evening). Please respond if you prefer one evening or the other, and if you can bring any Reiki tables to the share. (we can also use chairs, yoga mats, and cushions at the studio!)

Please spread the word to other practitioners you know! We will work in pairs or small groups depending on those in attendance.

A small donation will be appreciated to help cover the cost of the space rental.

Abundant blessings! <3 Kat
item.name: Reiki/Energywork sharing (Somerville)
